title: Low Rise Striped Pants for Women Pull On Drawstring Boho Wide Leg Jeans Trendy 2025
description: Made From 100% Cotton: These lightweight drawstring dress pants are breathable and skin-friendly, perfect for spring and summer. The NON-STRETCH fabric feels light and airy, ideal for warm, sunny days.
With A Low-rise Waist And Wide-leg Cut: These pull on trousers pants combine casual ease with a boho vibe, making them great for lounging or beach days
Striped Pattern Adds A Fun: Trendy touch to the flowy palazzo design, making these summer pants versatile enough for casual beach outings or relaxed evenings
A Must-Have for 2025: These tropical pants are stylish, comfortable, and perfect for casual days, summer getaways, or boho-inspired looks
Care: Machine washable for convenience, these pants are low-maintenance. Just skip the bleach to preserve their vibrant colors
